question_text: Expect two contacts this week, on Tuesday and Saturday.
In this contact, you will be asked up to six questions. Please check the answers that best describe your oral health behavior.
Did you brush your teeth this morning?
Which kind of toothbrush did you use?
At approximately what time did you first brush your teeth in the morning?
For how long, in minutes and seconds, did you brush your teeth this morning?
How much pressure did you use when you most recently brushed your teeth?  [for same-day recall]
Thank you for answering this Survey. Please click "FINISH".
